name: Planet Explorer
description:
Explore randomly generated planets, harvest resources, craft better gear in a beautiful side scrolling world

Controls

Right Click - Excavate Rock
Left Click - Add Rock
Space - Jump,
C - Crafting Bench,
T - Teleport (requires research from the crafting bench)
Shift - Escalate  (requires research from the crafting bench)

External Assets Used:

  • Character mesh and a few low poly meshes at the level start - [POLYGON - Sci-Fi City] 
  • Background Music - [SciFi Adventure Lib] 
  • Digging Sound Effect [UniversalSoundFX]  
  • Character Animation - Paragon's Murdock animation

The rest of the stuff was all coded by me within the gamejam timeframe and no external code libraries or plugins were used
